ComicInfo.Summary:
The infection on Mercury is revealed to be none other than the legendary Crossed disease, but how can that be? That was a work of fiction, right? Now Luiza finds herself in a position of having to eradicate this rapidly spreading horror before it can overtake the population of the mining town. Luiza is earning her pay on this mission!
Available with Regular, Wraparound, Art Nouveau, and Excessive Force by series artist Nahuel Lopez.
